content: this pattern calls for a 5mm hook but i used a 5 5mm because my gauge is unusually tight a typical crocheter should use a 5mm hook this pattern is intended to use with a hair tie that has a 1 inch diameter though stated colors are red and white to resemble peppermints any color combinations can be used this can also be completed with only one color youtube tutorial can be found here https //youtu be/cg6qsdvqr5g 1 needed materials red and white yarn medium worsted weight 4 5mm or 5 5mm hook i use a 5 5mm because my gauge is tight 1 inch hair ties 2 total stitch marker scissors sewing needle 1 https //youtu be/cg6qsdvqr5g
